page.title: 04OUR TRIP TO GREAT YARMOUTH
page.content: It was the first time Keely,Claire and Lorraine had stayed at a hotel.Our room No.218 was a bit on the grotty side of things."It's not fair,"we complained."Every other room had a shower or a loo.Not having these facilities proved a problem especially to Claire! When we first arrived we took the key from the door.We then went down to dinner.As usual one of the girls was being really revolting at dinner. First of all she put 7 spoonfulls of sugar in her tea and started to eat her napkin. We went upstairs to find that we were locked out.We told our teacher and he said "Well, your're daft!""Oh,"we said and decided to get the master key.That night the third years came to a mid- night feast at 22.45.Suddenly another teacher came in,"Get into your're own room!".she said, so they did.
